Package com.warzone.team08.VM

Class VirtualMachine

java.lang.Object
com.warzone.team08.VM.VirtualMachine
public class VirtualMachine
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the connection with different user interfaces. Creates an environment for the player to store the information.

    • newInstance

      public static VirtualMachine newInstance()
      Creates the single instance of the VirtualMachine class.
      Returns:
      Value of the instance.

    • exit

      public static void exit()
      Terminates gracefully. Signals its engines to terminate.

    • attachUIMiddleware

      public void attachUIMiddleware​(UserInterfaceMiddleware p_userInterfaceMiddleware)
      Adds the user interface middleware instance to the list of VM.

      Stubs/Skeleton can be created if CLI and VM are on different machines.

      Parameters:
      p_userInterfaceMiddleware - Value of user interface middleware

    • getInstance

      public static VirtualMachine getInstance() throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Gets the single instance of the VirtualMachine class which was created before.
      Returns:
      Value of the instance.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - Throws if the virtual machine instance was not created before.

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState​(GameState p_gameState)
      Sets new Keeps track of the game state.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - New value of Keeps track of the game state.

    • getGameState

      public GameState getGameState()
      Gets the state of the game
      Returns:
      Value of the game state

    • setGameStatePlaying

      public void setGameStatePlaying()
      Sets the game state to GAME_PLAY

    • MAP_EDITOR_ENGINE

      public static MapEditorEngine MAP_EDITOR_ENGINE()
      Gets VM runtime map-editor engine to store map runtime information.
      Returns:
      Value of the map editor engine.

    • GAME_PLAY_ENGINE

      public static GamePlayEngine GAME_PLAY_ENGINE()
      Gets VM runtime game-play engine to store runtime after game starts.
      Returns:
      Value of the map editor engine.

    • initialise

      public void initialise()
      Initialise all the engines to reset the runtime information.

    • askForUserInput

      public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.String> askForUserInput​(java.lang.String p_message)
      Asks user interface for input/action.

      Used asynchronous operation as some requests may take longer than expected.

      Parameters:
      p_message - Message to be shown before asking for input.
      Returns:
      Value of the response to the request.

    • stdout

      public void stdout​(java.lang.String p_message)
      Sends the message to output channel of the user interface.
      Parameters:
      p_message - Represents the message.

    • stderr

      public void stderr​(java.lang.String p_message)
      Sends the message to error channel of the user interface.
      Parameters:
      p_message - Represents the error message.
